subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a tough loss Sunday, José Reyes set the tone for the Mets' victory Monday by hitting a homer to lead off the game. But in a sense, Reyes canceled it out by going hitless in his next four at-bats.
snippet: Coming off a tough loss Sunday, José Reyes set the tone for the Mets' victory Monday by hitting a homer to lead off the game. But in a sense, Reyes canceled it out by going hitless in his next four at-bats.
